nodes.text: D'il pyykkles were a type of food that could be purchased on the planet of Lothal. In the year 5 BBY[source?] the Twi'lek pilot Hera Syndulla included d'il pyykkles on a shopping list of supplies needed by the crew of her VCX-100 light freighter the Ghost. She gave the list to Ezra Bridger and Garazeb Orrelios—two of her crewmates—who then traveled to the settlement of Kothal to purchase the items on the list. Orrelios managed to locate and purchase the d'il pyykkles and every other item on the list bar a meiloorun, which the pair then attempted to steal from the Galactic Empire.

D'il pyykkles were first mentioned in "Fighter Flight", the fourth episode of the Star Wars Rebels television show's first season, which aired on October 13, 2014. The list mentioning d'il pyykkles—which are a clear reference to real life dill pickles—was written using the aurebesh alphabet.
